# How to Find Sponsorship Opportunities

URL: https://howtofindsponsorshipopportunities.com
Description: Find sponsorships by building a media kit with audience demographics, identifying brands that sponsor similar creators, and pitching via personalized cold email. Even micro-influencers (1K+ followers) can land $500–5,000 deals.

## Quick Answer

Find sponsorships by building a media kit with audience demographics, identifying brands that sponsor similar creators, and pitching via personalized cold email. Even micro-influencers (1K+ followers) can land $500–5,000 deals.
